title: New changes are pure garbage
body: In all honesty, wtf was Riot thinking with most of these changes? The games a joke in it's current state. Anyone else feel the same way as I do?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Cakemeisting,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aUVYUKWt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-10T22:54:31.714+0000)
>
> Rengar seems pretty strong atm.

pretty strong is an understatement. he's broken OP and needs to be gutted. they honestly need to just give up on reworking him at this point and nerf him into the ground so no one can ever play him again.

Assassins are pretty dumb rn tbh, as a top laner i should be able to 1v1 them, but no i can't cause Zed steals AD, Kat has infinite hops, Talon can jump terrain, and LB was better when she could 1 shot you instead of what she currently does and Rengar can still 1 shot people, this  rework is a mess
Her spell vamp increases from 30% to 60%, she now has more escapes than she would've with her W transporting her while still being invisible and! she is still Akali
